00024 // pbrt.cpp*
00025 #include "pbrt.h"
00026 #include "api.h"
00027 // main program
00028 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00029         // Print welcome banner
00030         printf("pbrt version %1.3f of %s at %s\n",
00031                PBRT_VERSION, __DATE__, __TIME__);
00032         printf("Copyright (c)1998-2007 Matt Pharr and "
00033                "Greg Humphreys.\n");
00034         printf("The source code to pbrt (but *not* the contents of the book) is\n");
00035         printf("covered by the GNU General Public License.  See the file COPYING.txt\n");
00036         printf("for the conditions of the license.\n");
00037         fflush(stdout);
00038         pbrtInit();
00039         // Process scene description
00040         if (argc == 1) {
00041                 // Parse scene from standard input
00042                 ParseFile("-");
00043         } else {
00044                 // Parse scene from input files
00045                 for (int i = 1; i < argc; i++)
00046                         if (!ParseFile(argv[i]))
00047                                 Error("Couldn't open scene file \"%s\"\n", argv[i]);
00048         }
00049         pbrtCleanup();
00050         return 0;
00051 }
